about_the_game:
Moon Colony is an openworld survival game on the moon. Play as an astronaut and prepare the moon for future colonies.

Dig, collect and survive

Ensure your survival by collecting valuable minerals and raw materials. Craft the tools you need to complete your tasks. There are countless valuable resources to discover and collect, from which you can build tools, buildings and vehicles.

Explore a huge moon map

Explore a large and freely accessible moon map on foot or with nuclear-powered vehicles. There are many interesting locations from former moon missions and wracks to find.

Explore procedurally generated caves

Find procedurally generated cave systems with different resources and secrets under the moon. The deeper you go, the hotter it gets, so equip yourself well.

Main features

  • Terraforming
  • Survival: pay attention to hunger, thirst, temperature and oxygen
  • Open world: you have the freedom to go anywhere on a huge moon map, even under the moon and into orbit
  • Collect & Craft: Many resources, items and building parts for different purposes
  • Explore: procedurally generated caves, asteroid impacts and more...
  • Hidden secrets: crashed satellites & old moon bases could contain valuable resources and information from past missions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 2.6ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon 570, 4GB VRAM

short_description: Play as an astronaut on our moon in the future. Your task is to prepare the moon for future colonies by terraforming. Collect resources, explore procedurally generated caves, build buildings and create a second world for you and our earth.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
